thanks for your work tvteam. only complaint is no media info for your torrents. Would be awesome to know the video resolution and audio bitrate before downloading.
here is a program that tells you all that. You can simply copy and paste it in the info of your torrents. Source forge link so you know its safe..   http://mediainfo.sourceforge.net/en/Download
